extensions.v2.controllers

Class CharacterManager

  • java.lang.Object
    • extensions.v2.controllers.CharacterManager

  • public class CharacterManager
extends Object
    Manages the game characters' equipments (static class).

        public CharacterManager()

    • Method Detail

      • getDegats

        public static int getDegats(Personnage attacker,
                            Personnage victim)
        Calculates the total damages that a given target should get from an attacker. Which is: Sum(forces) - Sum(Protections). The returned value is always positive.
        Parameters:
        attacker - The character that is attacking, from which we retrieve the forces.
        victim - The character is getting attacked, from which we retrieve the protections.
        Returns:
        The total damages that the victim should take, always a positive value.

      • getEquipments

        public static ArrayList<EquipmentModel> getEquipments(Personnage personnage)
        Retrieves all the equipments of a given character. Defaulting on an empty array.
        Parameters:
        personnage - The character to look for equipments.
        Returns:
        The equipments of the given character.

      • getTotalForce

        public static int getTotalForce(Personnage personnage)
        Get the sum of all the damage values of the equipments, in addition the to character's base force.
        Parameters:
        personnage - The character to get the equipments from.
        Returns:
        The force (damage) sum of the given character.

      • getTotalProtection

        public static int getTotalProtection(Personnage personnage)
        Get the sum of all the protection values of the equipments.
        Parameters:
        personnage - The character to get the equipments from.
        Returns:
        The protection sum of the given character.

      • listEquipments

        public static String listEquipments(Personnage personnage)
        Lists the equipments of the characters.
        Parameters:
        personnage - The character to list the equipment from.
        Returns:
        The list of the equipments description.

      • registerEquipment

        public static void registerEquipment(Personnage personnage,
                                     EquipmentModel equipment)
        Add a given equipment to a given character.
        Parameters:
        personnage - The character that should receive the given equipment.
        equipment - The equipment to give.
